914 FAFO, slack-jawed faggots 😁 posted 4 days ago by SuperHonkey 118 comments award share report block Right Angle News Network @Rightanglenews • 5d BREAKING - Leftist journalists from Teen Vogue and Wired are being ruthlessly mocked after attempting to strong-arm their head of HR to reinstate dissolved departments focused on “climate” and “LGBT” justice, only to get fired themselves. These are who run the media.

Dear Millennials liberal women:   If you follow your boss down a hall shouting slogans about engagement after he told you to go back to your work areas, you're probably going to get fired.   This isn't that Marxist cess pool called college (see, Brett Weinstein, Evergreen) where the "professor" gets fired for making you feel bad. There are so few trans women in media at all — particularly ones who aren’t confined to ‘Queer Media’ — and I was incredibly proud of what my position at Bon Appétit meant at large. She added, “More important to me than my identity, I am also the Vice President of the NewsGuild of New York, and targeting me with a blatantly retaliatory termination like this feels like an egregious shot against our union and against media workers as a whole.” permalink parent award report block reply GodSaveTheWest 10 points 4 days ago He* permalink parent award report block reply Nick-Kerr 3 points 4 days ago Union. It did well for a whole four days before the entitled workers presented the owner with a list of demands, including expecting an ownership stake (!) and demanded that it be turned into a 'queer worker-owned cooperative' and educational center for far-left activities, rather than a for-profit business. (They failed to realize that wait staff, bussers, and kitchen help have no special talent or immutable characteristics that can't be replaced within the day).
